attributes.action: require the police/CPS to actively investigate and prosecute builders who commit fraud by taking money with no intentions of doing any work or deliberately flout regulations by using cheap and unsuitable materials, often leaving houses unsafe or uninhabitable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that it is the policy of the police to refuse to actively investigate fraud committed by builders.  They routinely claim the matter is just a civil dispute, often claiming that "you are just a dissatisfied customer" or "it is not a crime for a builder to be incompetent".  This attitude prevails even when: (1) money is taken and no work is done in exchange; (2) they deliberately use cheap and unsuitable materials, often leaving the house unsafe; (3) workers have been sacked for refusing to carry out work in a manner that is clearly dangerous; thus demonstrating that builders know it is wrong.  Many know that they won't be punished and CCJs are often impossible to enforce.  The foregoing equally applies to all other tradespeople who deal directly with the public.
